TopicTitle: does anyone know if theres a balloon mod so i can use a balloon instead on an engine

Articles.Content: Sorry, but you should post this in someplace else than this.

This should be in Add-on Affairs, not Releases.

EDIT: To answer your wrongly placed question, I think it may be Hooligan Labs

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-22T01:04:32Z" title="02/22/2015 01:04  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 22, 2015</time> by AppleDavidJeans**

Wrong forum, but [Hooligan Labs Airships](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53961-0-22-Hooligan-Labs-%28now-under-new-managment%29-Featuring-Airships-Subs-and-more) should be what you're looking for. However I'm not sure if it works in the latest KSP version atm;, it says 0.25 in the thread.
I'm not sure if Hooligan labs still works, but Procedural Airships does.
